issue.title: [CF 904] Maintank 1-40 ??????????
issue.body:
I want to track the EarthShield buff on the groups Tank. I can only choose to check Maintank1-40.....which tells me i selected too many targets. So i input Maintank1....still dont work. The icon also always shows. Even when i specifically tell it to only track when grouped/in instance. Can anyone give me examples of how i'm supposed to track healerbuffs on a groups tank?


> Posted by CurseForge user Zimura | Imported from CurseForge issue #904 | Raw

comments.body:
Quote:

I can only choose to check Maintank1-40.....which tells me i selected too many targets.

What do you mean when you say that it tells you that you selected too many targets? There is a message that you will see when you attempt to track more than 100 units of a specific type as a safety check since the most of any unit you could want is currently 40. Did you accidentally enter "maintank 1-400"?

maintank is only a valid unit in TMW when you are in a raid and some of your raid members are marked as a maintank in the raid interface (their specialization/role has nothing to do with this). If you want to track a specific unit, and this unit is consistent (i.e. someone from your guild, or a friend, who you frequently run with), track them by name. Otherwise, you should set the tank as your focus target and set your TMW icon to watch your focus.

Edited Jan 23, 2014
